law.catch_line: The filing of an application for sentence review under this subtitle does not:...

text.section:
The filing of an application for sentence review under this subtitle does not:
stay the execution of the sentence;
affect the time allowed to file an appeal or a motion for a new trial; or
affect the power of the sentencing judge to change the sentence to the extent allowed by the Maryland Rules.
After an application is filed, the sentencing judge may grant a stay of the execution of the sentence pending a decision under this subtitle.
